history.proof: intros A B RA x y RB z t H1 H2. apply H1.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A B : Type) (RA : rel A A) (x y : A) (RB : rel B B) (z t : B), RA x y -> RB z t -> RA x y

rel_compose = fun (A B C : Type) (RAB : rel A B) (RBC : rel B C) (x : A) (z : C) => exists y : B, (RAB x y /\ RBC y z)%type : forall A B C : Type, rel A B -> rel B C -> rel A C Arguments rel_compose {A B C}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope

rel_impl = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => R1 x y -> R2 x y : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_impl {A B}%type_scope (_ _)%rel_scope
rel_all = fun (A B C : Type) (R : C -> rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => forall c : C, R c x y : forall A B C : Type, (C -> rel A B) -> rel A B Arguments rel_all {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope
rel_inter = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y /\ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_inter {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
rel_union = fun (A B : Type) (R1 R2 : rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => (R1 x y \/ R2 x y)%type : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> rel A B -> rel A B Arguments rel_union {A B} (_ _)%rel_scope
rel_ex = fun (A B C : Type) (R : C -> rel A B) (x : A) (y : B) => exists c : C, R c x y : forall A B C : Type, (C -> rel A B) -> rel A B Arguments rel_ex {A B C}%type_scope _%function_scope

sum_rel_sind : forall (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (P : A1 + B1 -> A2 + B2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (inl x) (inl y)) -> (forall (x : B1) (y : B2), RB x y -> P (inr x) (inr y)) -> forall (s : A1 + B1) (s0 : A2 + B2), (RA + RB)%rel s s0 -> P s s0
arrow_rel = fun (A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (RB : rel B1 B2) (f : A1 -> B1) (g : A2 -> B2) => forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y) : forall A1 A2 B1 B2 : Type, rel A1 A2 -> rel B1 B2 -> rel (A1 -> B1) (A2 -> B2) Arguments arrow_rel {A1 A2 B1 B2}%type_scope (RA RB)%rel_scope : rename
arrow_rintro : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (RB : rel ?B1 ?B2) (f : ?A1 -> ?B1) (g : ?A2 -> ?B2), RIntro (forall (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ++> RB) f g where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type] ?B1 : [ |- Type] ?B2 : [ |- Type]
respectful_rintro : forall (RA : relation ?A) (RB : relation ?B) (f g : ?A -> ?B), RIntro (forall x y : ?A, RA x y -> RB (f x) (g y)) (RA ==> RB)%signature f g where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type]
RDestruct = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (T : rel A B -> Prop) => forall (m : A) (n : B), R m n -> forall P : rel A B, T P -> P m n : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> (rel A B -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments RDestruct {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope _%function_scope

rcompose : forall (x : ?A) (y : ?B) (z : ?C), ?RAB x y -> ?RBC y z -> rel_compose ?RAB ?RBC x z where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?C : [ |- Type] ?RAB : [ |- rel ?A ?B] ?RBC : [ |- rel ?B ?C]
rintro = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) (RIntro : RIntro P R m n) => RIntro : forall (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B), RIntro P R m n -> P -> R m n Arguments rintro {A B P}%type_scope {R}%rel_scope {m n RIntro}

Some_le_def : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> option_le RA (Some x) (Some y) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type]
Some_ge_def : forall (RA : rel ?A1 ?A2) (x : ?A1) (y : ?A2), RA x y -> option_ge RA (Some x) (Some y) where ?A1 : [ |- Type] ?A2 : [ |- Type]
Inductive option_le (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) : rel (option A1) (option A2) := Some_le_def : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> option_le RA (Some x) (Some y) | None_le_def : forall y : option A2, option_le RA None y Arguments option_le {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Some_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments None_le_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope
option_le_sind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall y : option A2, P None y) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_le RA o o0 -> P o o0
option_le_ind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall y : option A2, P None y) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_le RA o o0 -> P o o0
option_ge_ind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall x : option A1, P x None) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_ge RA o o0 -> P o o0
option_ge_sind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> (forall x : option A1, P x None) -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_ge RA o o0 -> P o o0
rdecompose : forall (x : ?A) (z : ?C), rel_compose ?RAB ?RBC x z -> exists y : ?B, (?RAB x y /\ ?RBC y z)%type where ?A : [ |- Type] ?B : [ |- Type] ?C : [ |- Type] ?RAB : [ |- rel ?A ?B] ?RBC : [ |- rel ?B ?C]
option_rel_sind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> SProp), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> P None None -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_rel RA o o0 -> P o o0
option_rel_ind : forall (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) (P : option A1 -> option A2 -> Prop), (forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> P (Some x) (Some y)) -> P None None -> forall (o : option A1) (o0 : option A2), option_rel RA o o0 -> P o o0
rgraph_done = fun (A B : Type) (R : rel A B) (a : A) (b : B) => R a b : forall A B : Type, rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments rgraph_done {A B}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Inductive option_ge (A1 A2 : Type) (RA : rel A1 A2) : rel (option A1) (option A2) := Some_ge_def : forall (x : A1) (y : A2), RA x y -> option_ge RA (Some x) (Some y) | None_ge_def : forall x : option A1, option_ge RA x None Arguments option_ge {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments Some_ge_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope Arguments None_ge_def {A1 A2}%type_scope _%rel_scope
Related = fun (A B : Type) (f : A) (g : B) (R : rel A B) => R f g : forall A B : Type, A -> B -> rel A B -> Prop Arguments Related {A B}%type_scope _ _ _%rel_scope
RExists = fun (A B : Type) (P : Prop) (R : rel A B) (m : A) (n : B) => P -> R m n : forall A B : Type, Prop -> rel A B -> A -> B -> Prop Arguments RExists {A B}%type_scope _%type_scope _%rel_scope
